Reviews.Title: Good, but beware of design flaw
Reviews.Author: Jeffrowan10s
Reviews.Content: I bought the unlocked version of the Dell Streak 5 with great anticipation. I expected that it would become my go-to e-reader and serve as a truly portable web access device. Despite the great strengths of the unit, I wound up having the strangest experience I've had with a piece of electronic equipment in 30 years. The problem was very simple: I couldn't keep the back cover (over the battery compartment) attached! It was impossible to attach the back cover securely enough to get it to stay on permanently. It might stay on for 10 minutes, or an hour, or more, but eventually it would fall off, causing the unit to power off while in the middle of a task. You can easily imagine how annoying this was.I eventually went online, looking for answers to this problem. What I found was that so many other people had experienced the same problem, there were forums discussing this issue. There was even a Dell tutorial on You Tube showing how to properly secure the back cover. The problem was, it didn't help.When I reported this to Dell, they were very helpful and promptly sent me a new unit. Even though I had a similar problem with the new unit, eventually I was able to secure it in place. Now that that issue has been resolved (at least for now), there is much to like about the unit. Dell, I believe, found the sweet spot between portability and viewability. It is a fine e-reader and web tool. If not for the back cover issue, I would give it 4 stars. It surprises me that Dell hasn't done more to promote this product!

Reviews.Title: Impressive!
Reviews.Author: Tony L.
Reviews.Content: Love love love it! It has a big 5" screen but the phone is very thin. It fits nicely in my front pocket. The touch screen is beautiful and very responsive, which is really impressive. I owned an iPhone (I still own it) but I always wanted an Android device. Have tried Sony Xperia before and it's a disaster. All the issues I had with Xperia like lagging and unresponsive screen etc are nowhere to be found on Streak. Everything is smooth. The SWYPE keyboard is a genius! GPS is very accurate even without the data connection. I can use the Streak as an external USB device to copy and move files (not only on PC, but works on Mac too). Wi-Fi tethering is a breeze! I am seriously impressed by the built-in quality of Streak. But I do think Dell did a poor job to promote this phone. All we heard on Android is from HTC, Moto, Samsung etc but I am glad I chose the Streak.

Reviews.Title: Nice tab/phone
Reviews.Author: Nicolaos Chrysanthou "Nick"
Reviews.Content: I too would like to extend my congratulations to the designers of this phone/tab. It is a bit big for a phone but it is a device which you can depend on whilst on your feet. I have a background of blackberries, HTCs, ipads and the rest of them and I find this gadget as quite reliable for my business needs. Even the kids love its size and prefer its portability to the ipad. In a 5 inch screen you can edit documents, read books, surf the net (normal sites not only mobile sites, work on your email folders, and watch the world on youtube....

Reviews.Title: a powerful all-in-one handset!
Reviews.Author: Zen Buddy
Reviews.Content: Pros: large 5-inch display, crystal clear screen, GPS is very good and accurate, strong speaker sound, two cameras both front and back, android multitasking, dubbed as a USB storage device, tons of android apps to play withCons: large 5-inch display (I am not complaining, but my S.O. thinks it's too big to carry as a cellphone), the USB cable is a proprietary one and quite pricey if you want an extra one from Dell.The 5-inch screen is big, or is it really? It works perfectly for me and a large screen has much better user experience when you try to do something on it, like creating some office documents on the go. Not to mention a 5-inch screen is much better for web surfing and watching videos and pictures. I have used the streak for about a month and really enjoy it. No need to carry MP3 player, GPS, digital camera, daily planner etc, it's all in one now. Technology is a wonderful thing!

Reviews.Title: So Awful No Words
Reviews.Author: Lulubell
Reviews.Content: I was looking forward to test this cell phone and I was hoping to try it out. After charging the device I made several attempts to turn it on. I booted correctly about two times. I spent an entire day removing the battery to rest and then inserting the battery, closing the back lid over and over. The phone will not turn off unless the lid cover is on otherwise it hibernates. I have two degrees in IT so imagine my frustration when I finally had to say hell this is the most worthless piece of equipment that I have ever come across. I tested phones for my phone company for more than nine years, and I have never seen an outcome so undesirable. How this product ever made it to this level of is rather astounding. One would think when Dell decided to offer a cell phone that it would be amazing.  This is sad..so sad.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: font21
Reviews.Content: I just love it!Yes, it has a huge screen. That's going to make the device itself huge.Impact damage. The Dell Streak is very susceptible to side impact damage. So get a good case for it like the OtterBox Commuter Case - Case for smartphone - silicone, polycarbonate - black - Dell Streak. Due to it's screen's tough Gorilla Glass, there is no need for a clear plastic screen protector film.

Reviews.Title: avoid
Reviews.Author: Bill "that guy"
Reviews.Content: I've been using my Streak for about 6 months, and on the whole I'm happy with it.  At first, I had the problem others mentioned regarding the battery cover popping off.  This powers the phone off, and thus is a serious problem.  Since I had a skin on it, I just put some tape over the cover, and it's been fine ever since.  Low tech, simple solution.One reason I bought this was to replace a broken e-reader.  The large screen works well for reading and browsing the net.  I've never had any serious problem with the phone, and the sound quality is acceptable.  With moderate use, I can go about 1.5 to 2 days before charging, though I rarely use the internet on it.The only area I find it truly lacking in is the camera.  It works, but the quality leaves much to be desired.  If that is important, might want to look at a Note or something similar.  otherwise, the strak is fineUpdate: I used it for about 9 months with no issue.  One day, it started rebooting, and wouldn't stop.  The sho where I bought it referred me to Dell.  Dell deserves its reputation for poor customer service.  I was told that they do not make phones.  I was told that the warranty had expired about 8 months before I bought the phone.  I was told a lot of things, but nothing that would qualify as useful.  After a few months, I bought a Samsung and haven't looked back.I'd recommend not buying this.  I would accept it as a gift, but wouldn't get too attached to it

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: hdtravel
Reviews.Content: This has got to be one of the best kept secrets in the cell phone business. It is really too bad that Dell has hardly done anything to market this wonderful phone. It has just been a "hobby" device for them.Android is present with loads of available apps from the app store.Gorgeous nice large 5 inch screen makes using this baby pure pleasure. Once you try 5 inches, let me tell you there is no going back. It makes the tiny 3.5 inch screen on my iPhone 4 look like a toy phone.This device is fast and response and just a joy to use.Very highly recommended Phone.

Reviews.Title: not 16 gb sd
Reviews.Author: rodrigo santibañez
Reviews.Content: Mass Deception, did not the micro sd 16, the phone is worth what you're paying ..poor performance of the screen ..

Reviews.Title: Perfect Combo of Tablet & Phone
Reviews.Author: Shopaholic Chum
Reviews.Content: Dell Streak 5 Unlocked Android Tablet Smartphone (16GB, GSM, WiFi + 3G, Bluetooth)Having introduced to Android world thru Coby Kyros, I found the Dell Streak 5 to be a masterpiece and for sure as others have mentioned this phone lacked marketing. The biggest advantage for me using this phone is the 5 inches screen because anothing more than this would hurt my hand during prolonged use and anything lesser than this wouldn't give such a great feel; The moment I opened the package I was literally surprised by its awesome looks and edges, setup was very much easy and interacting with the smartphone was like slipping a splinter into cheese! The features it carried along was so good right from wifi connectivity, bluetooth and so on; This phone was able to pickup wifi signals even far off (thou argueably the router also is a consideration); It has got very decent, good and worthy apps as part of its bundle right from quickoffice which was a great plus; thou its a little bigger to use it as a conventional phone a bluetooth enabled headset would always compensate when paired! I dont use 3G but there is one thing that's worth mentioning if you are planning to use only wifi; AT&T; automatically recognised iPhone and made the data option compulsory but when i used the same SIM with this smartphone (with WIFI only and disabling the carrier data services) they haven't forced any such data plans for the past 4-5 months; From my point of view there is only one thing that needs a little improvement, the speakers; Overall this is worth the money and it has become a part of everything that's in my schedule!

Reviews.Title: Made in China
Reviews.Author: stephen lynard steen
Reviews.Content: Was not as clear as I thought it was going to be.. If I would have known I would have just got the Kindle Fire XD for the same price. an a better look

Reviews.Title: superb phone
Reviews.Author: G. francis "honest hope"
Reviews.Content: Great phone, would have given it a 5 star,,if it was a bit more lighter in weight.....no regrets.... it is giving the Iphone and samsung competition

Reviews.Title: Nice Product but...
Reviews.Author: Pedro Esquivel
Reviews.Content: Mine didn't include free hands. Charger seems to be generic and not Dell as expected. Also, didn't include any manual (Not necessary) but as new product this wasn't what I expect.

Reviews.Title: Im mad and sad
Reviews.Author: diego marrtinez
Reviews.Content: Slow and dont have update of android sistem only 2.2 and dont have anymore and never dell never care about those smartphone

Reviews.Title: charger sucks, faulty touch
Reviews.Author: Lokesh
Reviews.Content: The charger of this junk is always in trouble, does not work at all. Touch is faulty and sometime hangs. Never really worked this phone. Dell should quit this business!

Reviews.Title: Dell 5 is what u need!!!
Reviews.Author: Raj
Reviews.Content: I am too much in tech and i wanted the phone which looks big and yet slim and fit in my pocket. It serves the purpose. I needed phone which could deliver very good speed with apps, games including high resolution games from gameloft and ubisoft. It serves the purpose. Only drawback i felt was android 2.2 which is official in US. If dell can consider upgrading it, it can be a boom in market. I don't know how the dell 5 users think, but this is it from me. Enjoy the Dell 5!!!

Reviews.Title: Unlocked Dell streak 5
Reviews.Author: BELLA "Amazona"
Reviews.Content: I like my phone, but I have a few issues...The volume is very low when I'm talking on the phone but the media sound is perfect. Currently, my carrier is simple mobile which runs on tmobile network and voice and texting, mms is great but the data speed is too slooow ( edge) now that I learned a little bit more,I'm switching to straight talk which runs on AT&T; and according to what I have read, with att network, the speed will be faster(3G)because of the phone frequencies compatible with AT&T.; I will be updating when I switch to straight talk.Update 9/26/12I switched to Straight Talk and the phone works nice. Data is faster than before. It works on H. I'm very happy with the change.What I forgot to mention before was that when I bought the phone, the screen froze and I learned that you have to calibrate  and problem solved!Update 6/30/13I had an other issue with this phone. It did not let me access my contacts for a while, I got the message (android.process.acore) every time I wanted to access my contacts. This is my solution: I did a factory reset. I lost all of my contacts but previously I email them to my self. Fortunately I did not loose my pictures. I lost apps that I bought, but I took a picture of my apps so I could retrieve them after the factory reset. I got my apps back. It takes patience but it worked for me. I also left the auto synk off before signing in with my google account (advice I got online) when I retrieved Nimbuzz app, it gave me the message again, but immediately I removed it and the message never came back.

Reviews.Title: Missing Memory card,headset and pouch
Reviews.Author: madhav
Reviews.Content: looking good but missing above items please check before ordinghave to check about functions and performance.First look  is good

Reviews.Title: it broke
Reviews.Author: Catherine Richard
Reviews.Content: do not purchase. It broke when I took off the screen protector packaging. the circuit board ripped off and the back and home key no longer worked.

Reviews.Title: I love this phone
Reviews.Author: skhab
Reviews.Content: I like the phone, battery wears off quickly though. Otherwise it is a great phone for the price I got it for. It quite an experience, especially the kindle app, the screen size makes it enjoyable to read kindle books. So happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: It's Not All It's Cracked Up to Be
Reviews.Author: alex
Reviews.Content: was not worth the purchase plan; it has no more features then an android phone, and for a 3G it moves rather slow

Reviews.Title: What a great disappointment
Reviews.Author: HN Ezuoke Ugochukwu
Reviews.Content: This phone to me is the worst phone i have ever used, i three of this phone in two weeks, i first bought the Dell venue which i noticed cannot work without sd card, when i make a call nobody hears my voice only when someone calls me that they can hear my voice, so i resorted to using bluetooth without which i cannot make a call. I requested to change it and but Dell streak, i bought it being that the condition stated new and should include all the accessories only for me to open it and lo it was used with no single accessory, has 0% battery life, i plugged it to power source to see if it will charge, for one hour the battery life still remains 0%. i returned the phone same day i received it, and requested to have it changed, amazon suggested a different buyer i did bought the phone it was shipped under one day delivery as amazon waived the fee for me. When i received the phone the following day, i opened it and it was same thing as the previous buyer, no accessories but has like 60% battery life, i complained to amazon and they ask me to return it and even refunded the money, i took the phone home with hope if it remains good i will forget about the accessories, but to my disappointment, it was same thing as Dell Venue and even worst, phone cannot function without SD card, i make call nobody hears me. My little advice to buyers is before buying read my post and if you can handle this, (should it occur to you) then go ahead, if not dont waste your money on Dell phone, they need more work on their phone before selling it to consumers.

Reviews.Title: need firmware change
Reviews.Author: rino
Reviews.Content: First of all : this is not a phone with 16 gb internal memory. It has only 1.5 gb memory in it. when i stated to use with sd card , the device is not recognizing the micro sd card. It wil show preparing the card for 10 mins and its getting stuck..so at last  I changed the firmware and updated with a custom ROM longhorn 2.9.3 final and now every features are working. camera as okay and just keep in mind that Dell discontinued the Streak 5 on as of August 15, 2011.So don't expect any kind of warranty. use it at  your own risk.

Reviews.Title: Quick delivered, but not everything works, also miksing SD Card
Reviews.Author: Jan Eric Chute
Reviews.Content: GPS works a few seconds then the phone reboots. Several factory reset.Turned off The GPS.Suppose to come with 16GB SD card, but not delivered.Other than that OK.

Reviews.Title: Buy it- it is just as good as the Samsung Note series - but without the cost.
Reviews.Author: Steven
Reviews.Content: Pros:  high speed tweaking, control wireless, gps, and online freeware apps to directly download.  3G networks and high speed internet access.  Superior phone interface in simple and effective operation.Cons: it is big and you should use it with a gel case or hard shell protective case.Bottom Line:  I see whiners on here complaining about the cell phone's back.... if you use a gel soft case for $5 or a hard case box- you won't have any issues and since if you drop this phone or a samsung note series phone- you will incur damage from gravity.  Yet- another reason to buy a $5 gel protective cover  or hard case- common sense here people- common sense.I find my phone at 80% off the original price - on it and support products...  This is an outstanding product - save your money and get it instead of a $600 contract phone.  It is just as fast- without the cost.  I have used other phones- but for the value and savings this is your best bet.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Carlos Najera
Reviews.Content: This is a great product, thank you. I will recomend to buy it, great tool for everything. Just love it.

Reviews.Title: not worth it
Reviews.Author: Lana Davis
Reviews.Content: although customer sevice was great,, the phone its self was garbage. Unable to do updates because the phone kept shutting off. not much in the market for this phone either.

Reviews.Title: Wow....
Reviews.Author: Melvin
Reviews.Content: the best tablet and phone in one.handy very light and can put in my uniform pocket.i can check my email right away.thanks..you make me amaze and WOW...

Reviews.Title: streak
Reviews.Author: dee77
Reviews.Content: HAd a dell streak that i love, love, loved.....and then.. i dropped it, broken. this replacement was delivered quickly , original packaging. but GPS was glitchy, and phone also did not function right. sadly , had to return it. dell isn't making these any more , so i went to the only available ( similar size, functions etc..) option-- the galaxy note.  If i get a little extra dough aside though i may put it toward the (pricey) fixing of my streak- as a back up..

Reviews.Title: I am highly annoyed
Reviews.Author: Abdul Razak Adams
Reviews.Content: do not order for this product, they will send you crappy tablet instead. i had to return this, and reorder, they again sent me a tablet.wasting my time!

Reviews.Title: It's the bag of chips :)
Reviews.Author: donna perkinson
Reviews.Content: Just got this phone today and am so pleased.  I'm in my golden years and it was easy even for me to set up.  Love the tutorials and self help gadgets.  The 5" screen is amazing, color good sound excellent.  What else can I say.  I just put the battery in, charged it up, (which only took and hour), put in the sim card and sd card and all my infor transfered with no prob.  IT'S ALL THAT FOLKS.  :)

Reviews.Title: I love my phone!!! Nuf said
Reviews.Author: zop
Reviews.Content: I love my new cell phone!!! I saw this phone from a co-worker. She said that the only problem that she had with it is the back panel will not stay on! I took the plunge and bought it anyway. But I realized after purchasing mine, that she was not putting it on correctly. That was my only reservation about the phone, but with that gone it is just perfect! I love reading books, watching movies, always being connected to my social network and the works with this phone!!! A great buy and gets the full 5 star treatment from me!

Reviews.Title: Good Device
Reviews.Author: Walterjr316
Reviews.Content: This is a really good device and the company had it sent on time. However, their was a scratch on the phones body which was a little disappointing. All in all the device works great.

Reviews.Title: Cybrowm-Review
Reviews.Author: Cyril I. Ezeanyagu "De Booker"
Reviews.Content: This product is fabulous. It has got everything I wanted .It is the ultimate machine to have. I highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Dear Friends
Reviews.Author: luis
Reviews.Content: The Dell Streak Mini 5 Is a Great Smartphone To Have.  I Haven't Had No Trouble With It At All And I Like It.

Reviews.Title: Terrible!!!!! Do not purchase!
Reviews.Author: TheAmazingKhufu
Reviews.Content: Terrible! Trouble and not working at all now!!!! It was slow and froze all the time. I would appreciate a full refund of my money. I spent over $300. On the phone and accessories!!!

Reviews.Title: fake
Reviews.Author: Indira Stephanie Moore
Reviews.Content: Since i bought it, it never works. that is very bad. buy it at your own risk. check it before you buy. thank you.

Reviews.Title: A tablet in your pocket!
Reviews.Author: Paul James Harper "Paul James Harper"
Reviews.Content: I have the Dell Streak 5 rooted with the Olleh Rom which is Android 2.3.3. (Google: xda developer dell streak 5 olleh for 'destructions') I also have Backtrack 5 a Linux Penetration Testing Distribution  running on it as well.Now if only my Otterbox would get out of Cambodian Customs where it has sat since 17 February!OtterBox Impact Series Case for Dell StreakCould do with some sort of bluetooth keyboard as well when using Backtrack.I love this device!I will note that though it has phone capability I prefer to use it only for data. I use my old Nokia E63 as a phone also in an Otterbox case. It kind of looks funny up against the side of your face.Nokia E63 Smartphone 002P1V9OtterBox Commuter Case for Nokia E63

Reviews.Title: very old
Reviews.Author: Capital Global Explorer.inc
Reviews.Content: very old , this devices is not unlock factory. I'm not happy!!! I'm not happy . I m not happy for this porches  !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!1111

Reviews.Title: don't waste money on this product
Reviews.Author: Daniel Addo
Reviews.Content: this product has the potency of messing you up. the screen freezes frequently. The picture quality is good but the functions are not user-friendly.

Reviews.Title: too  many problems piece of crap phone
Reviews.Author: david reese
Reviews.Content: returning 3rd S-5 for battery wont charge and not windows compatable wont link to pc.. 3rd replacement pending i month wait

Reviews.Title: Internal SD Problem
Reviews.Author: David Ortega Valverde "Gamer"
Reviews.Content: The phone worked a month and then it got slow, turn it off and turned on and then stopped working, gets stuck in the DELL logo. As I read and read on the Internet, say it is a problem of internal memory, nothing to do.

Reviews.Title: It's a Dell
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: The hardware is moderately crappy, the design and usability left much to be desired. The screen is not as good as the iPhone one by a long shot. Leaving aside all the Android issues, it's a Dell and that says all you ever need to know.Before you spend the money, ask yourself if your want to spend countless hours of your time dealing with Dell "support". Their Indian call centers are staffed with highly-qualified professionals who will guarantee plenty of hair-pulling. Your Streak will likely arrived locked to ATT, if it's ever needs to be replaced (mine needed that twice in 1 year), the replacements will also be locked.  So it goes. It's a Dell.

ProductInfo.Features:
5-inch widescreen display optimally designed for the mobile web/video/movies
Crystal-clear scratch-resistant Gorilla glass screen
Integrated social networking widgets and apps, plus tons of apps through the Android Marketplace
Google Maps with navigation and text-to-voice, turn-by-turn directions with Street View
Multitasking Google Android OS that gives you the freedom to do what you want
ProductInfo.Name: Dell Streak 5 Unlocked Android Tablet Smartphone (16GB, GSM, WiFi + 3G, Bluetooth)
